Articles.Content: What coding language does KSP use? C#?
yes, on top of Unity as game engine.
Yes, C# is the main language used for KSP modding.
AFAIK, you could use any CLI compliant language and you'd still be able to import your code into KSP with a small bridge. Principia does that, it's actually written in C++.
Principia is not C++ compiled in CLI. It is native code called from a C#plugin.

> 
> Principia is not C++ compiled in CLI. It is native code called from a C#plugin.

Welp the more you know.
There are other CLI languages that should produce working addons. F# and IronPython are probably the best prospects, although I haven't tried either with KSP.
